enableRuneDescriptions.name: Enable Rune Descriptions
enableRuneDescriptions.hint:
Toggles automatic adding of rune descriptions to items.
If you are using the module 'Sundry: Small Tidbits for (Mostly) PF2e', this option will not appear.

firstTurn.name: Add 'Before Turn' effect
firstTurn.hint:
At the start of combat, adds an effect to all but the first combatant, preventing Reactions until their turn.
If you are using the module 'Sundry: Small Tidbits for (Mostly) PF2e', this option will not appear.

showSettingScopeIcons.name: Show setting‚Äëscope icons
showSettingScopeIcons.hint: Prepends üåç (World) or üë§ (Client) icon to each setting entry.

nonlethalButton.name: Nonlethal Button
nonlethalButton.hint: Adds a button in the Attacks section that applies the nonlethal attack effect.

enableRealTimeClock.name: Enable Real-Time Clock
enableRealTimeClock.hint: Enables automatic in-game time progression based on the real-world system clock.

clockSection.label: Clock Settings
clockSection.hint: Options related to the real-time clock behavior.

showClockHUD.name: Show Clock HUD
showClockHUD.hint: Displays the current in-game world time at the top of the screen.

secondsPerRealSecond.name: Game seconds per real-time second
secondsPerRealSecond.hint: How many seconds pass in the game world for each real-life second (outside combat).

enableSellToMerchant.name: Enable selling to merchants
enableSellToMerchant.hint:
If disabled, the module will not intercept or handle selling items to Merchant loot actors (Only GM).
If you are using the module 'PF2e Toolbelt', this option will not appear.

enableUsedReactionEffect.name: Add 'Reaction Used' effect
enableUsedReactionEffect.hint:
After every used reaction automatically adds the 'Reaction Used' effect to the character, which ends at the start of their next turn.
If you are using the module 'Sundry: Small Tidbits for (Mostly) PF2e', this option will not appear.

enableRoundMarkers.name: Add round markers in chat
enableRoundMarkers.hint: At the start of each combat round adds a special chat message to separate rounds for better readability.

enableExplorationEffects.name: Enable Exploration Effects
enableExplorationEffects.hint: If enabled, activating exploration actions will create effects on the actor. They will be removed when combat starts.

enableReadyEffect.name: Add 'Ready Action' effect
enableReadyEffect.hint: After using the 'Ready' action, automatically adds a 'Ready Action' effect to the character that expires at the start of their next turn.

enableCustomTurnMarker.name: Custom Turn Marker
enableCustomTurnMarker.hint: Replaces the default token turn marker with a luminous magic circle icon.

journalFont.name: Font
journalFont.hint: Choose the font used in the system.

firstTurn.name: Before Turn
firstTurn.description: You can't use reactions until the start of your turn.

nonlethal.name: Effect: Nonlethal Attacks
nonlethal.desc:
You take a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

You can make a nonlethal attack to knock someone out instead of killing them (see Knocked Out and Dying). Weapons with the nonlethal trait (including fists) do this automatically. You take a ‚Äì2 circumstance penalty to the attack roll when you make a nonlethal attack using a weapon or unarmed attack that doesn‚Äôt have the nonlethal trait. You also take this penalty when making a lethal attack using a nonlethal weapon. Spells and other effects with the nonlethal trait that reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points knock the creature out instead of killing them.

notifications.added: The ‚ÄúNonlethal Attacks‚Äù effect has been enabled.
notifications.removed: The ‚ÄúNonlethal Attacks‚Äù effect has been disabled.

usedReaction.name: Reaction Used
usedReaction.description: This character has used their reaction. The effect ends at the start of their next turn.

readyEffect.name: Ready Action
readyEffect.description: This character has readied an action and will act when their trigger occurs. The effect ends at the start of their next turn.
